mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PORTFOLIO ( member_id, stock_id, quantity, avg_purchase_price, purchase_date ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{stockId}, #{quantity}, #{avgPurchasePrice}, #{purchaseDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.member_id, p.stock_id, p.quantity, p.avg_purchase_price, p.purchase_date, p.updated_at, s.stock_code, s.stock_name, s.market_type, s.industry, s.current_price FROM PORTFOLIO p INNER JOIN STOCK s ON p.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY s.stock_name

SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.member_id, p.stock_id, p.quantity, p.avg_purchase_price, p.purchase_date, p.updated_at, s.stock_code, s.stock_name, s.market_type, s.industry, s.current_price FROM PORTFOLIO p INNER JOIN STOCK s ON p.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE p.portfolio_id = #{portfolioId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PORTFOLIO SET quantity = #{quantity}, avg_purchase_price = #{avgPurchasePrice}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE portfolio_id = #{portfolioId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.stock_id) as stockCount, COALESCE(SUM(p.quantity * p.avg_purchase_price), 0) as totalInvestment, COALESCE(SUM(p.quantity * COALESCE(s.current_price, 0)), 0) as totalValue, COALESCE(SUM(p.quantity * (COALESCE(s.current_price, 0) - p.avg_purchase_price)), 0) as totalProfit, CASE WHEN SUM(p.quantity * p.avg_purchase_price) > 0 THEN ROUND((SUM(p.quantity * (COALESCE(s.current_price, 0) - p.avg_purchase_price)) / SUM(p.quantity * p.avg_purchase_price)) * 100, 2) ELSE 0 END as totalProfitRate FROM PORTFOLIO p INNER JOIN STOCK s ON p.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId}
